name: linuxgsm
description: LinuxGSM is a CLI tool to deploy and manage dedicated game servers. It supports over 100 games and simplifies installation, updates, backups, and monitoring using a terminal-first interface.
features: Game Server Management: 100+ game support, Easy installation, Automated updates. Deploy game servers quickly.
CLI Interface: Terminal-based, Script automation, Batch operations. Manage servers efficiently.
Monitoring & Backups: Server monitoring, Automatic backups, Alert notifications. Keep servers running smoothly.
Multi-Server: Manage multiple servers, Centralized control, Resource monitoring. Run entire game server fleets.
